definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: Of these 15 people to smallpox to the Easter Island.
sentences.chinese: 這15人也把天花帶到了復活節島。

sentences.english: The programme is to be broadcast in four episodes, culminating on Easter Sunday with the Resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 該節目共有四集，復活節將上演最後一集基督的復活。

sentences.english: Each Easter Eddie eats eighty Easter eggs.
sentences.chinese: 每個復活節艾迪都喫八十個復活蛋。

sentences.english: A congregation in Vorkuta gathers to celebrate Easter at a midnight Mass.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾庫塔會衆在午夜彌撒上團聚，慶祝復活節。

sentences.english: Archaeologists have solved an ancient mystery surrounding the famous Easter Island statues.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家發現著名的復活節島巨古石像的祕密。

sentences.english: She and I loaded her mom's black Chevy Beretta to the ceiling with the Easter baskets.
sentences.chinese: 我和蘇珊把她媽媽的黑色貝里塔車裝滿了復活節禮筐。

sentences.english: Maundy Thursday served as a preparation for the feast of Easter about to follow.
sentences.chinese: 濯足日乃是爲著緊接著到來之復活節筵席所做的預備。

sentences.english: Marshmallow Peeps are America's favorite non-chocolate Easter candies.
sentences.chinese: 果漿軟糖是美國最喜歡的非巧克力復活節糖果。

sentences.english: Not that Hanna and I weren`t happy again after the first day of Easter vacation.
sentences.chinese: 復活節過後的第一天，漢娜和我過的都挺開心的。

sentences.english: The island chiefs had competed to erect ever bigger statues.
sentences.chinese: 復活節島的領主們競相修建更大的石像。

sentences.english: On Easter Sunday morning, children hunt for the eggs and candy.
sentences.chinese: 在復活節的早上，孩子們就可以尋找彩蛋和糖果。

sentences.english: Lent is the forty-six day period just prior to Easter Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 四旬齋是早期復活節裏面爲期46天的時期。

sentences.english: At Easter, attendances at church rose.
sentences.chinese: 復活節期間，到教堂做禮拜的人多了。

sentences.english: Eby, welcome to the Easter factory.
sentences.chinese: 伊比，歡迎光臨復活節工廚。

definition: Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
